sourcesContent:
{{dialogTitle}}
Roll No label @if (studentAttendanceForm.get('rollNo')?.hasError('required')) { Please enter roll no }
Student Name account_circle @if (studentAttendanceForm.get('sName')?.hasError('required')) { Please enter student name }
Class Class A Class B Class C Class D Class E Class F @if (studentAttendanceForm.get('class')?.hasError('required')) { Select Student Class }
Date @if (studentAttendanceForm.get('date')?.hasError('required')) { Please select date }
Status Present Absent @if (studentAttendanceForm.get('status')?.hasError('required')) { Select Status }
Note
